Data.text_description:
The probability of air pressure being high (A=1) is 0.5489. 
The probability of physical health being high (B=1) is 0.3262. 
For those with physical health being low (B=0), the probability of temperature being high (C=1) is 0.1390. 
For those with physical health being high (B=1), the probability of temperature being high (C=1) is 0.0224. 
For those with air pressure being low (A=0) and temperature being low (C=0), the probability of quality of teaching being high (D=1) is 0.3201. 
For those with air pressure being low (A=0) and temperature being high (C=1), the probability of quality of teaching being high (D=1) is 0.4448. 
For those with air pressure being high (A=1) and temperature being low (C=0), the probability of quality of teaching being high (D=1) is 0.4142. 
For those with air pressure being high (A=1) and temperature being high (C=1), the probability of quality of teaching being high (D=1) is 0.5460.
